"""
This script adds all IHttpRequestResponse items that are not in scope to the above table.
Thereby, the rows of the table are deduplicated.

You can use this script to perform a review on the current scope configuration. Furthermore,
you can use the above table's context menu, entry "Add Selected Host(s) To Scope" to
include certain IHttpRequestResponse items to Burp Suite's scope. 
"""

# Do the initial setup
if ref == 1 or "dedup" not in session:
	header = ["Ref.", "Host"]
	session["dedup"] = {}

# Process only out-of-scope HTTP requests
if not in_scope:
	host = get_hostname(url)
	if host not in session["dedup"]:
		rows = [[ref, host]]
		session["dedup"][host] = None
name: Scope - Template Script To Obtain List of All Out-Of-Scope Hostnames
